app.title: A service for international wholesale trade with remote access | ZENNNN
app.description: Welcome to the revolutionary service for international wholesale trade with a possibility of remote control and purchasing management. All the operating activity of the company is located in one system.

home.title: Back office for international trade
home.info: ZENNNN combines operational accounting, sales, work of back office, warehouses, CRM functions, freelancers, document flow and clients into one algorithm to make remote work with foreign suppliers truly convenient and simple.
home.feat2: Provides your clients with the access to important information in their personal account
home.feat3: Reminds about the important things in work
home.feat5: Allows everybody to work from anywhere in the world
home.feat6: Shows each employee's KPI and company's profit

payment.title: Payment
payment.paymentAlert: The payment will be transferred to your account {email}. If you are an employee of a company, you don't need to pay for your account. The account of the company where you work is paid by your employer. Please make sure that the chosen plan suits you and you are the manager of the company connected to the account you pay for.
payment.cancelTitle: Do you want to cancel subscription?
payment.cancelText: After subscription cancellation, functions of the system will be blocked. You still will be able to access your account, see the data but no changes will be allowed.
payment.contactHint: Please leave your contacts and we will reach out to you as soon as possible to look closely at your needs and offer the best way of using ZENNNN.

payment.oneUSD: You can continue working in the advanced mode during 1 more month for 1 USD.
payment.owner5Days: Hello, {name}. The {product} subscription on your company's master account will expire in {5 days}. Please pay for the subscription up to {date}. ZENNNN is worried that the absence of payment can affect your company's work.
payment.member5Days: Hello, {name}. The {product} subscription on your employer's corporate account will expire in {5 days}. Please remind your employer to pay for the subscription up to {date}. ZENNNN is worried that the absence of payment can affect your work.
payment.ownerExpire: Hello, {name}. The {product} subscription on your company's master account expired. That means you can enter your account and look through the data in ZENNNN but editing functions are temporarily unavailable. Please pay for the subscription to continue working. Thank you.
payment.memberExpire: Hello, {name}. The {product} subscription on your employer's corporate account expired. That means you can enter your account and look through the data in ZENNNN but editing functions are temporarily unavailable. Please remind your employer to pay for the subscription to continue working. Thank you.
payment.owner1USD: Hello, {name}. Unfortunately, the trial period came to an end. We want to give you an opportunity to continue using ZENNNN next month with Advanced plan just for 1 USD. Later you can choose any other appropriate plan.
payment.member1USD: Hello, {name}. Unfortunately, the trial period of your corporate account came to an end. Your employer can prolong possibility to use ZENNNN next month with Advanced plan just for 1 USD. Please let him know about this wonderful news.
payment.ownerPromo: Hello, {name}. Promo period of Advanced plan will expire in 5 days. It's time to decide which plan is the best for you. Go to the Plans page to pay for the subscription.
payment.memberPromo: Hello, {name}. Promo period of Advanced plan will expire in 5 days. Please remind your employer that it's time to decide which plan is the best for you and pay for the subscription.
payment.ownerPromoExpire: Hello, {name}.Unfortunately, promo period of using ZENNNN expired. That means you can enter your account and look through the data in ZENNNN but editing functions are temporarily unavailable. Please choose the plan and pay for the subscription to continue working.
payment.memberPromoExpire: Hello, {name}.Unfortunately, promo period of using ZENNNN expired. That means you can enter your account and look through the data in ZENNNN but editing functions are temporarily unavailable. Please remind your employer to choose the plan and pay for the subscription to continue working.

pricing.premiumEcon: Individual price depends on the terms of service

pricing.premiumDescription: Personal approach is personal in everything

pricing.feat5: Full support with transition to the ZENNNN logic
pricing.specCount: Number of records in data base

pricing.spec10: Personal documents based on system patterns
pricing.spec12: Sending SMS notifications to clients and suppliers (available from 07.2020)
pricing.func3desc: (contract, agreement, appendix in one, two languages)
pricing.func5: Database of clients, suppliers and goods
pricing.func7: Sharing data about the company inside the system
pricing.func8: Sharing data about the goods inside the system
pricing.func11: QR-codes of goods and page of the product
pricing.func13: Calculation of the margin and commission
pricing.func15: Statuses of the goods during work with a deal
pricing.func18: Roles of employees in the company
pricing.func24: Module of container loading via QR code
pricing.func25: Module of calculating the lowest possible import price
pricing.func26: Price list import from Microsoft Excel and Google Tables
pricing.func27: Unloading goods in world famous marketplaces
pricing.func28: Unloading data to the accounting services
pricing.more: And tens of other automatic functions
pricing.a1: It is a tool which helps to save time and resources of your company. It helps to optimize the work and makes it look like a game. The employer simply needs to keep track of "Deals" section to make sure all of the created deals are getting green(üéæ).. This means that all the good are located in the warehouse. Another important marker is a blue light(üíô), which signals that the shipment was sent. The presence of both markers means that your work with the deal is finished and now it's receiving party's job. Thus the instructions of your manager or system operator are quite simple. They need to fill in all the necessary fields for goods to become green(üéæ)..
pricing.q2: What are the deals and how do they work?
pricing.a2: Deals are a constructor which collects minimum data for international trade. This data is important for logistics companies, clients, customs clearance and preparing documents for the selling goods. The constructor helps to fix the price of purchase and sale of the product. It also helps to set retail margin and conduct operational activities which is necessary for every company. All the goods and services have their cost prices and clients costs. You can sell products of one supplier to your clients as well as of many different suppliers. All of these is possible thanks to functionality of ZENNNN.
pricing.q3: How do the margin and commission functions work?
pricing.a3: If you are a dealer and your supplier's prices are clear for the client (market).Put the supplier's price in the "For client column. Put the commission percent from your dealer agreement in the section below.ZENNNN automatically calculates the price of each product which each supplier needs to pay. The profit is also calculated automatically. The margin is necessary if you work with the cost price of goods and set client's price by yourself. Set the margin and invite a client into the personal account with automatically calculated prices including your profit. You can set prices automatically for the whole set of goods as well as individually. For the second option turn off "All goods" mode.
pricing.q4: How can ZENNNN help in remote purchasing of goods?
pricing.a4: a) A manufacturer can create its account in ZENNNN and share information about goods with you. You can control all the information in your personal account with this manufacturer. b) You can find a foreign citizen, add them to the structure of the company as a manager. They will collect and record information about goods in their native language which you will see in your language. Thus you will have an opportunity to change financial information, keep track of this employee's activity and control shipment.
pricing.q5: What is a client's personal account?
pricing.a5: Imagine that your commercial proposal or a price list looks like a cart in an online shop. Your clients will be able to track all the main stages of your work and, if needed, comment each product or service. This account can be seen in different languages which allows foreign clients to collaborate with you.
pricing.a6: During the process of purchasing goods, each product may have different statuses. When a product isn't completely described i.e. model, number, price, it is considered to be planned and has Pending status (grey marker). A product with the number and price means that a manager started working with it so it has Processing status (red marker). In most cases if a manager set all the information about a product about the number, prices and cargo characteristics , then this product has "In production" status (yellow marker). Finally, a product in stock consequently has "In stock" status (green marker). Blue marker means "sent" status and is related to the whole set of goods.
pricing.a7: A Director has full access to the functionality without limitations.
pricing.a8: Any organization structure has its hierarchy. Access to certain information and functions is set according to the position of a specialist. For example, if you are the owner of the account and you have three legal entities for different needs, so only you have the permissions to edit this information. Employees of the company can't add and edit such important information. This is done so for security reasons and to avoid mistakes during document creation.
pricing.a9: Warehousemen can include your own employees as well as third party organization which provides warehouse services. For this role only sections with information about the goods, names, numbers, package and volume are available. The price section is unavailable. It is done so to prevent warehousemen from finding out material value of the cargos they work with. Also warehousemen don't have access to your database of clients, suppliers and goods. They can't create and print documents.
pricing.a10: A manager has access to almost everything necessary for working with clients. Managers can't employ people, add legal entities' details, which are used by your company and can't see clients added by other managers. This rule protects your client database from stealing in case an employee is fired. If you need to transfer a client from one manager to another, you just need to enter the full name of the client during creation of a deal. For example, Apple Inc. The clients added by a manager will be shown in the search by the matching letters. For example, when you enter 'ap' you'll see Apple Inc., April Tailor and other matching results.
pricing.a11: ZENNNN accountants like any others control money movement between contractors and record dates based on payment documents. Accountants have access to all current deals, they can fix the dates of pre- and postpayments as well as rates for financial documents. However, editing all the other information is unavailable for them.
pricing.q12: What is automatic compilation of documents?
pricing.a12: ZENNNN isn't only a beautiful interface, all the data entered during the working process will be used as soon as you have a need. Apart from that, ZENNNN understands what languages should documents contain by their type as well as the way data should be formatted for the document to be completed properly. If there is something missing, ZENNNN can help you. You don't need to use Word or Excel for document creating and pay a translator for a version in different language.
pricing.q13: What if I have more employees than the plan I chose includes?
pricing.a13: a) You can choose another plan with bigger number of users, b) we don't limit number of users working with ZENNNN in one account simultaneously. Although doing so can provoke errors due to discrepancies among employees using the same account. Apart from that, system logics made to reduce the number of employees working with sales and logistics to optimize teams by means of extended process automatization. Roles of managers, accountants, warehousemen and directors are enough to cover all of the business processes of every company. Increasing number of managers and warehousemen is necessary as a result of increasing number of clients and cargos.
pricing.a14: This role has access to the minimum functions. Freelancers can see only the deals they were invited to. They can add extra photos of goods and decription. They can see warehouse information but can't edit it. They also don't see prices. This role is necessary for product inspection when you need to go to a supplier to check availability and quality of the products. As this activity doesn't require a special employee in the company, freelance worker is the best choice.
pricing.q15: What function does each plan include?
pricing.a15: All the functions except SMS notifications are available in all of the plans. Limitations are connected with the number of employees in the main account of the company.
pricing.q16: If a ZENNNN user shares information with me, who else can see it?
pricing.a16: All the data which can be shared inside the system has its settings: available to one person, available to everyone, unavailable.
pricing.q17: Your system has the same functions as many others. Why should I choose ZENNNN?
pricing.a17: As people use numbers to calculate and letters to write, functionality of computer systems is pretty similar.  The difference is in the efficiency of the tool. The first device used for calculation was wooden abacus, then calculator, then ECM, specialized software and now it's ZENNNN. Joking aside, we are really concerned about the question how we can improve existing tools of conducting accounting and financial management to get rid of numbers in the future.

companyDetail.showImporterDetails: Show ZENNNN clients the cargo receiver's details.
companyDetail.legalDetailHint: Please use the company details in the native language to compose the documents properly for the shipping or selling country.You can ask the client to send the details. Alternatively, you can specify the details in English in the fields below.
companyDetail.privateDetailDesc: (the same as in the passport or ID)
companyDetail.privateDetailHint: All the information from this page will be used in the contract, invoice and other documents the system will prepare automatically. The documents will also contain the full name and the date of birth. Shortly before sharing the information of the deal with the client, you will be able to set which documents to show.
companyDetail.showContacts: Show ZENNNN users your contact details
companyDetail.privacyWarning: ZENNNN does not recommend storing personal data of private persons in the system. If the local legal system demands adding personal inforamtion as necessary details, you can add them below. They will be automatically used in all the needed documents. It would be perfect to have a copy of a client's ID stored in a safe place and use only the full name, address and date of birth in the system.

hint.ucn: Unique client number (UCN) is generated by the system automatically. Letter A corresponds to commercial organizations (legal entity), letter B ‚Äî private persons, C ‚Äî non-commercial organizations etc.
hint.usn: Unique supplier number is generated by the system automatically.
hint.mobilePhone: Make sure the mobile number is correct. This number will be used to send automatic notifications which make our common work a lot easier.
hint.email: Make sure the email address is correct. This address will be used to send automatic notifications which make our common work a lot easier.
hint.clientLocale: You need to set the language for notifications to make sure your clients receive understandable notifications. All the documents will contain the language you set and English.
hint.supplierLocale: You need to set the language for notifications to make sure your suppliers receive understandable notifications. All the documents will contain the language you set and English.
hint.companyLocale: Please use the national language of the country where you're planning to receive cargos. It will facilitate interaction with other ZENNNN users.
hint.companyName: If the company only has an English name, activate the switch for the autofill.
hint.companyNameLocal: ZENNNN highly recommends filling in the details of your company in English. If the legislation requires using company information in the national language, e.g. when you operate within the country, the best solution is creating one more company in your list. In this case the details of the additional company can be completely in the national or local language.
hint.mailingAddress: If the legal and mailing addresses of the company coincide, activate the switch for the autofill.
hint.deliveryAddress: If the delivery and mailing addresses of the company coincide, activate the switch for the autofill.
hint.familyName: If client and contact person is the same person, activate the switch for the autofill. Make sure the name is the same as in the ID and it is in the same language or in English.
hint.phoneAndFax: This phone number and fax will be used in all the documents as contact information of the client.
hint.privateAddress: If the client's place of residence and mailing adress coincide, activate the switch for the autofill.

rule.mainBankName: The main bank will be used in all the documents by default. A company may have a lot of bank accounts, here you can set the bank to use by default and change it right before the printing.

contract.paperDate: The date of the document is filled in automatically when printing and corresponds to the creation date of a specification in the "My Deals" section.
contract.table: In this area there will be an automatically generated table with a list of goods, their quantity and final cost, calculated according to the established currency rate for financial documents.
